Articles.Content:
I have a very weird problem. I am using the Outer Planets Mod and have sent a probe to Tal (one small moon) to scan it for resources. The moment the survey completes, everything goes wrong:

There are no resource overlays. When I enter map mode, my craft disappear (all of them) and also the orbital paths of the celestial bodies. Sometimes I can go to the Space Center and then get back to my craft if I am lucky. But as soon as I focus on Tal, the problem acts up again.

I am basically stuck with a broken savegame due to this particular moon not wanting to be scanned. Any ideas how I could get that working again? Does anyone of you already have tried scanning Tal in OPM?
I was gonna say that to make sure that you have all the icons on the top white so it shows you the crafts, but it seems that that isn't the case. Sorry bro, haven't had this problem before. :S

I manually deleted the resource scan entry for the defective planet in question. Now I can use the savegame again. But gathering resources from that planet is now just guessing where to land instead of using the feature efficiently.
